indications: clindamycin phosphate topical solution , clindamycin phosphate topical gel clindamycin phosphate topical lotion indicated treatment acne vulgaris . view potential diarrhea , bloody diarrhea pseudomembranous colitis , physician consider whether agents appropriate ( , ) .
contraindications: apply thin film clindamycin phosphate topical solution , clindamycin phosphate topical lotion , clindamycin phosphate topical gel , clindamycin phosphate topical solution pledget application clindamycin phosphate twice daily affected area . one pledget may used . pledget used discarded . lotion : shake well immediately using . pledget : remove pledget foil . seal broken . discard single . keep liquid forms containers tightly closed .
warningsAndPrecautions: clindamycin phosphate topical solution containing clindamycin phosphate equivalent 10 mg clindamycin per milliliter available following sizes : 30 ml applicator bottle—ndc 59762-3728-1 60 ml applicator bottle—ndc 59762-3728-2 carton 60 single-use pledget applicators—ndc 59762-3728-3 clindamycin phosphate topical gel containing clindamycin phosphate equivalent 10 mg clindamycin per gram available following sizes : 30 gram tube—ndc 59762-3743-1 60 gram tube—ndc 59762-3743-2 clindamycin phosphate topical lotion containing clindamycin phosphate equivalent 10 mg clindamycin per milliliter available following size : 60 ml plastic squeeze bottle—ndc 59762-3744-1

ingredients.name: CARBOMER HOMOPOLYMER TYPE B (ALLYL PENTAERYTHRITOL CROSSLINKED)

name: clindamycin phosphate
indications_original: Clindamycin phosphate topical solution, clindamycin phosphate topical gel and clindamycin phosphate topical lotion are indicated in the treatment of acne vulgaris. In view of the potential for diarrhea, bloody diarrhea and pseudomembranous colitis, the physician should consider whether other agents are more appropriate (see CONTRAINDICATIONS, WARNINGS and ADVERSE REACTIONS).
contraindications_original:
Apply a thin film of clindamycin phosphate topical solution, clindamycin phosphate topical lotion, clindamycin phosphate topical gel, or use a clindamycin phosphate topical solution pledget for the application of clindamycin phosphate twice daily to affected area. More than one pledget may be used. Each pledget should be used only once and then be discarded.
                  Lotion: Shake well immediately before using.
                  Pledget: Remove pledget from foil just before use. Do not use if the seal is broken. Discard after single use.
                  Keep all liquid dosage forms in containers tightly closed.
warningsAndPrecautions_original:
Clindamycin phosphate topical solution containing clindamycin phosphate equivalent to 10 mg clindamycin per milliliter is available in the following sizes:
                     30 mL applicator bottle—NDC 59762-3728-1
                     60 mL applicator bottle—NDC 59762-3728-2
                     Carton of 60 single-use pledget applicators—NDC 59762-3728-3
                  Clindamycin phosphate topical gel containing clindamycin phosphate equivalent to 10 mg clindamycin per gram is available in the following sizes:
                     30 gram tube—NDC 59762-3743-1
                     60 gram tube—NDC 59762-3743-2
                  Clindamycin phosphate topical lotion containing clindamycin phosphate equivalent to 10 mg clindamycin per milliliter is available in the following size:
                     60 mL plastic squeeze bottle—NDC 59762-3744-1
adverseReactions_original: Clindamycin phosphate topical solution, clindamycin phosphate topical gel and clindamycin phosphate topical lotion are contraindicated in individuals with a history of hypersensitivity to preparations containing clindamycin or lincomycin, a history of regional enteritis or ulcerative colitis, or a history of antibiotic-associated colitis.
